name: The Gem (Metzinsoft)
description:
Story

Tom and Ron are given the chance to acquire a Magical Gem for Professor Squawks's museum. But a dangerous, dark gray wolf has his glowing red eyes fixed on the gem, as well... 

A cute, short adventure story about two friends learning to get along. Told with lots of silly animal characters along the way.

Info

Status COMPLETE  /  Play Time 10-15 Minutes  /  Download Size 231 MB

This is a Windows Build  /  Unzip the file  /  Run "Game.exe"

  • Press F4 after running game to toggle Fullscreen mode.
Art Credits

Animal Portraits (Cats, Dog, Horse, Seagull, Chick, Goat, Pig, Rabbit)

http://fayforest.sakura.ne.jp/

Secondary use, sale, and redistribution of materials are prohibited.

Cat sprites

VX RTP cat recolors by Granny

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/grannys-lists-vx-ace-animal-sprites.30456/

Some animal re-colors by me.

All other art is included in RPG MV Game Engine.
